Package org.vaadin.addons.beantuplecontainer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeanTupleContainer
    BeanTupleContainer enables using JPA 2.0 Tuple type-safe queries with lazy batch loading, filter, sort and buffered writes, and supports joins where more than one entity is returned (as is the case with joins).
    BeanTupleItem
    BeanTupleItem allows accessing and modifying entities retrieved in a Tuple.
    BeanTupleItemHelper
    Query that returns a Tuple
    BeanTupleQueryDefinition
    Type-safe implementation of JPA 2.0 Tuple-based query definition.
    BeanTupleQueryFactory
    Create a query based on a query definition.
    BeanTupleQueryView
    Wrapper around the LazyQueryView.
